title: Last ditch Olympics appeal by Russian athletes fails
text:
Last ditch Olympics appeal by Russian athletes fails 8:07am GMT - 01:48 
The Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) said on Friday it has dismissed 47 appeals from Russian athletes and coaches to participate in the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics, which open later in the day. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) said on Friday it has dismissed 47 appeals from Russian athletes and coaches to participate in the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics, which open later in the day.
